XVtc_Config Struct Reference

#include <xvtc.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This typedef contains configuration information for a VTC core. Each VTC device should have a configuration structure associated


Public Attributes

u16 DeviceId
u32 BaseAddress

Member Data Documentation

u32 XVtc_Config::BaseAddress

BaseAddress is the physical base address of the core's registers

u16 XVtc_Config::DeviceId

DeviceId is the unique ID of the VTC core
